qas.question: What does A cappella mean in the Italian language?

answers.text: in the manner of the chapel

qas.question: What is another term occasionally used to refer to A cappella?
At what point did Renaissance polyphony become popular again?
How is A cappella currently defined?

answers.text: group or solo singing without instrumental accompaniment

qas.question: A cappella was originally used to tell the difference between which two styles?
What is group or solo music called?
What does cantata music lack that Acappella has?
What is a synonym for cantata?

plausible_answers.text: Renaissance polyphony and Baroque concertato style

qas.question: What did cantata origionally differerntiate between?
What term is also used as a synonym for concertato?
Alla breve was originally used to tell the difference between what styles?

plausible_answers.text: a renewed interest in Renaissance polyphony coupled with an ignorance of the fact that vocal parts were often doubled by instrumentalists

qas.question: What led to alla breve meaning unaccompanied vocal music?
What does Baroque concertato mean in Italian?
What does Renaissance polyphony contrast with that means accompanied singing?

context: <b5_0><b10_0>A cappella<b10_0/><b5_0/> [a kapˈpɛlla] (Italian for <b13_0>"<a0_0>in the manner of the chapel<a0_0/>"<b13_0/>) music is specifically <a3_0>group or solo singing without <b6_0>instrumental accompaniment<b6_0/><a3_0/>, or a piece intended to be performed in this way. It contrasts with <b14_0>cantata<b14_0/>, which is accompanied singing. The term "a cappella" was originally intended to differentiate between <a4_0><b9_0><b11_0>Renaissance polyphony and Baroque concertato<b11_0/><a4_0/> style<b9_0/>. In the <a2_0>19th century<a2_0/> <b12_0>a renewed <b8_0>interest in Renaissance polyphony<b8_0/> coupled with an ignorance of the fact that vocal parts were often doubled by instrumentalists<b12_0/> led to the term coming to mean unaccompanied vocal music. The term is also used, albeit rarely, as a synonym for <a1_0><b7_0>alla breve<b7_0/><a1_0/>.
